DOC.brief_summary: Wheat germ by-product wheat-milling industry high nutritional value therefore could use raw source preparation food product bread , cooky , muffin , etc . The aim study assess effect ingest wheat bread supplement wheat germ gastrointestinal discomfort , blood cholesterol postprandial glycaemic response healthy human volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Wheat Germ Gastrointestinal Discomfort , Blood Cholesterol Postprandial Glycaemic Response
DOC.detailed_description: This crossover , double blind , placebo control randomized trial . The study compare effect consumption wheat bread without wheat germ healthy individual , 2 intake period 4 week 5 week washout crossover . The study focus effect wheat bread supplement wheat germ gastrointestinal discomfort , blood cholesterol postprandial glycaemic response healthy human volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Adult men woman Age 18 60 year Healthy volunteer free chronic disease relevant effect gastrointestinal system visceral motility Without diagnosis digestive disease include functional bowel disorder IBS Nondiabetic , gastric bypass surgery Have fast plasma glucose ( fingerstick ) < 100 mg/dl ( < 5.5 mmol/L ) Nonsmoker Willing able provide write informed consent Subject prescription medication digestive symptom antispasmodic , laxatives antidiarrheic drug digestive auxiliary Relevant history , presence medical disorder intake medication / dietary supplement , potentially interfere trial screen Subjects stool frequency â‰¤ 1 stool every 7 day Subjects willing avoid pre probiotic duration study Intake antibiotic last 4 week laxatives last 2 week Current use medication lower blood cholesterol glucose Change dietary habit within 4 week prior screen ( instance start diet high fibre ) Pregnant subject subject planning become pregnant study ; breastfeed subject Subjects history drug , alcohol substance abuse , factor limit ability cooperate study Participants anticipate change lifestyle physical activity level since may also influence result Known food intolerance allergy Subject involve clinical food study within precede month
